title: LF D5+ ADC/JG for FLEX 5 MAN
body:
Hey Summoners,

We are a friendly group of guys who take the game relatively seriously.
I have almost exclusively played competitive League in the last year and dislike playing soloq where players would prefer to fight with each other instead of fighting the enemy.
I am not too concerned if you finished last season Diamond 5, I am just looking to play 5s Q with a preferably fixed, if not rotating roster. I have had a lot of team experience and can offer a lot to newer players looking to start playing competitively.

About me:
Support Main
Season 6 Challenger peak but Master for most of the season
Positive mentality + attitude

Looking for:
Diamond 5 or above last season
Working comms
Looking to improve

Add me in game to discuss further

IGN: bluz0r
